cast.name: 安娜·霍普金斯 Anna Hopkins
阿隆·艾布拉姆斯 Aaron Abrams

introduction: A pair of business travellers have an affair and decide it might be easiest to just forget about it. This film is a part of Short Cuts Programme 7. In Montrealer Mark Slutsky's sly and seductive comedy, Mia Kirshner and Aaron Abrams are funny, sexy, and cool as co-workers who resort to unusual measures to keep a business-trip indiscretion on the down-low.
